title: Advanced Dedicated Server Manager Matchmaking
description: Automatically create, manage, and optimize dedicated servers for your Unreal Engine game. Easy setup, global hosting, and advanced monitoring included.
longDescription:
We support 4.25 and up, you just have to go to our website and download it from there, you will go through verification to check if you own the plugin but after you will have access to wide range of engine versions.


In summary, Server Manager is the ultimate solution for streamlining the creation and management of dedicated servers in your Unreal Engine game. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to enhance your game's performance and provide an exceptional experience for your players.


Get started with Server Manager today and elevate your game to the next level!





Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ):


Can I have multiple servers?

Yes, you can have as many servers as you need without any limitations. Our master server will automatically select the optimal server for users searching for a match, ensuring that no single server gets overworked.


Can I have servers in different regions?

Absolutely! You can set up servers in various regions within the server manager, allowing clients to search for matches in specific regions of their choice.


Does the system optimize server usage?

Yes, our system optimizes server usage efficiently. When users search for a match, the master server evaluates the current load and selects the server with the lowest usage. If all servers are nearing capacity, it keeps players in the queue to ensure that no server exceeds 90% capacity, maintaining optimal performance.


Do you actually add new features requested?

Of Course! If you have any feature that you don't see but would like to see it added, we can have this worked on.




Advanced Monitoring and Insights:

  • Resource Tracking: Easily monitor and track resource usage for each server.
  • Advanced Statistics: Gain valuable insights with detailed statistics on the number of servers created and users connected.
  • Optimized Performance: Use this data to optimize your game's performance and ensure smooth server operations.



Key Features:

  • Create Match: Easily set up new matches.
  • Find Match: Quickly locate available matches.
  • Manage Servers: View and manage all servers seamlessly.
  • Region Search: Find servers in your preferred region.
  • Player Queue: Organized queuing system for players.
  • Server Browser: Browse and join servers effortlessly.
  • Customizable Matchmaking: Adjust matchmaking delays to suit your needs.
  • Configurable Settings: Tailor settings to your preferences.
  • Automatic Server Maintenance: Automated server clean-up for optimal performance.
  • Comprehensive Server Control: Full access to manage server data.
  • Custom Server Variables: Add and retrieve custom server variables in blueprints.
  • Comprehensive Integration: Comes with a fully assembled example project and detailed documentation for seamless integration into your existing project.
  • Global Hosting: Host servers from anywhere in the world, enabling you to reach players globally (Requires you to host on your own servers, or get cloud servers).
  • Region-Specific Servers: Set server regions to allow users to connect from their specific locations, enhancing their gaming experience.
  • Region Selector: Ensure players always connect to the nearest server for an immersive and lag-free experience.



New Update Features:

  • Simplified Integration: Easier setup and attachment of server manager to projects.
  • Instant Server Creation: Allows for immediate server hosting, ideal for custom games without waiting.
  • Password-Protected Servers: Option to set passwords for server creation.
  • Random Player Access (Public/Private): Control whether random players can join newly created servers.
  • Accurate Ping Calculation: Server browser now accurately calculates user ping for versions 4.26 and above.
  • Optimized Server Browser: Improved server browser functionality, compatible with versions 4.26 and above.
  • Host Request Cancellation: Automatically removes host requests if the user cancels finding a match to prevent unnecessary server spooling.
  • Performance Optimization: Enhanced overall performance by 25%.
  • Active Server Selector: View and select specific servers (e.g., NAE-California, NAE-Georgia) similar to games like Valorant.
  • Ping-Based Server Sorting: Sort active servers by ping to prioritize the best connections.
